use.style: stroke-dasharray: 273; stroke-dashoffset: 273; animation: drawLine 3.9s ease-out 0.05s forwards;
stroke-dasharray: 100; stroke-dashoffset: 100; animation: drawLine 1.4s ease-out 4s forwards;
offset-path: path('M 228.83 56.35 C 288.31 -20 407.26 -20 466.73 56.35'); animation: counterClockwiseKick 3.9s ease-out forwards;
offset-path: path('M 466.73 56.35 L 366.81 56.35'); offset-rotate: 0deg; animation: moveBallRush 1.4s ease-out 3.9s forwards; opacity: 0;
stroke-dasharray: 48; stroke-dashoffset: 48; animation: drawLine 1.3s ease-out 6s forwards;
offset-path: path('M 362.05 56.35 C 356.1 30.24 344.21 30.24 338.26 56.35'); offset-rotate: reverse; animation: moveBallIncompletion 1.3s ease-out 6s forwards; opacity: 0;
